fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Culture, Customs, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Gruppo Uffici stampa (GUS) is a non governamental organization which promotes interests of Italian journalists with tasks of press officers and/or spokespersons. 
In this function GUS  has direct contact with the EU Institutions (European Commission, Olaf, European Parliament, etc), also through the use of intermediate vectors such as media, public opinion, conferences or social events, targeting the EU Institutions.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
In particular, GUS activities include: 
-          Contacting  Members and their assistants, officials and other staff of the European Institutions; 
-          Programming, circulating and communicating letters, information material and discussion/position progress, etc; 
-          Organizing events, meetings for journalists and communicators, promotional activities and conferences, for which invitations are sent to Members and/or their assistants, officials and other staff of the EU institutions. 
In addition  to this, we draw your  attention  to the fact  that from 2009 GUS is member - observer of the Olaf Anti-Fraud Communication network (OAFCN). 
Link: 
http://ec.europa.eu/anti-fraud/media-corner/anti-fraud-communicators-network/oafcn-members_en
goals__remit: Il Gus é nato nel 1965 con l'obiettivo  di valorizzare e far conoscere la nuova specializzazione  del giornalismo negli ufficio stampa a livello europeo. In relazione  agli interressi e rapidi movimenti evolutivi, nell'ambito della comunicazione di impresa e dei mass media, soprattutto dal punto di vista tecnologico, il Gus ha esteso  la propria attività all'aggiornamento ed allo sviluppo culturale della professione del giornalista in Europa. Il Gus contribuisce  attraverso la sensibilizzazione dei giornalsti europei  e gli accordi presi con  la rete OAFCN  dell'Olaf  alla tutela degli interessi finanziari dell'Unione Europea.
